name: Smash Through Dungeon
description:
Smash Through Dungeon!

Hundrets of zobies skeletons and more. They're all on first level. That should be easy. The're is one issue only. The're are hundrets off them!!! Now, you have to smash you're way to exit the dungeon. Goog Luck!!!

How To Play:

Click the arrow button(keybord), or swipe the screen, to the direction, that arrow  the over the enemies are poiting.

Good Luck!
